title: Dinnerbone&Searge: 今天将会有快照
author: pca006132
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2015-9-16 19:08 编辑 
Dinnerbone: There will be a snapshot today. If I finish what I'm working on in time, it will contain more bones.
晚餐骨: 今天将会有一个快照。如果我完成了我现在制作的东西，这快照将会有更多的骨
Searge: Yes, there will be a snapshot later today. And it will contain changes. And bug fixes. And new bugs. And performance tweaks. And fps drops.
Searge: 对，今天晚点将会有个快照。它会包括改变、漏洞修复、更多漏洞、效能调整和帧率下降

Dinnerbone: I apologise only slightly for all the deaths that the next snapshot will bring.
晚餐骨: 我只对新快照带来的所有死亡道歉
(难道新快照的怪物将会增强？)

链接：
https://twitter.com/Dinnerbone/status/644063974431031296

https://twitter.com/Dinnerbone/status/644095857449664512

https://twitter.com/SeargeDP/status/644071397975851008
